definitions.text: (sports) someone in charge of training an athlete or a team
a person who gives private instruction (as in singing, acting, etc.)
a carriage pulled by four horses with one driver
a vehicle carrying many passengers; used for public transport
examples: he always rode the bus to work

definitions.text: teach and supervise (someone); act as a trainer or coach (to), as in sports
examples: He is training our Olympic team
